titles.title: Helping Families and Seniors Save on Health Care Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the increase in the income threshold used in determining the deduction for medical care.
Helping Families and Seniors Save on Health Care Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Helping Families and Seniors Save on Health Care Act of 2013 - Repeals the provision of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act that increases the adjusted gross income threshold for claiming the tax deduction for medical expenses.
